name: Vampire Run
description:
You are a vampire trying to outrun the sun for as long as possible. Unfortunately for you, all it does is delay the inevitable.

For controls you can use arrow keys or wasd. Use left and right to move left and right, up to jump and down to switch between bat and human form. Be careful though, as you cannot jump while you are a bat.

Post a screenshot of your score in the comments and I will make a leader board!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 50

Music: https://mattjhart.itch.io/spiral-game-boy-music-rom
